A

AbstractComponent - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.components
The class AbstractComponent represents the basic information and methods for components in the component model, completing the component virtual machine with operations dealing with individual components.
AbstractComponent.AbstractService<V> - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.components
The abstract class AbstractService provides the basic method implementations for component service calls.
AbstractComponent.AbstractTask - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.components
The abstract class AbstractTask provides the basic method implementations for component tasks.
AbstractComponent.ExecutorServiceFactory - Interface in fr.sorbonne_u.components
The functional interface ExecutorServiceFactory proposes a mean to provide a factory creating executor service instances to be added to the executor services of the component.
AbstractComponentHelper - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.components
The class AbstractComponentHelper defines a set of static methods used in the class AbstractComponent but also in some others.
AbstractComponentHelper() - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponentHelper
 
AbstractConnector - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors
The class AbstractConnector partially implements an abstract connector between two components by assuming that the offering component implements the offered interface.
AbstractConnector() - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
create a connector.

AbstractCVM - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm
The class AbstractCVM defines the common properties of component virtual machines in the component model.
AbstractCVM() - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
create and initialise a local CVM.
AbstractCVM(boolean) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
create and initialise the CVM, tagged as distributed if the parameter is true, and as local otherwise; note however that distributed CVM must be created as subclasses of the class AbstractDistributedCVM, so this constructor should never be called directly but only through the other constructor of this class or through one of the constructors of AbstractDistributedCVM.

AbstractDistributedCVM - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm
The class AbstractDistributedCVM defines the common properties of distributed component virtual machines in the component model.
AbstractDistributedCVM(String[]) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractDistributedCVM
instantiate the DCVM object.
AbstractDistributedCVM(String[], int, int) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractDistributedCVM
instantiate the DCVM object redirecting the stdout and the stderr to a window frame position at the coordinate (xLayout, yLayout) among the similar frames created by the same application (e.g., xLayout = 1 and yLayout = 1 will put the frame at the right and below the origin frame).

ActiveDataConnector - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors
The class ActiveDataConnector partially implements an active connector that can be used to connect active components in a synchronised way, on a mix of active and passive components using a full or partial pull mode.
ActiveDataConnector() - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.ActiveDataConnector
 
ActiveDataConnector(int) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.ActiveDataConnector
creates a new connector with some data buffer capacity, and with the default behavior of being both an active puller and pusher with minimum intervals between each push and each pull of 100 milliseconds.
ActiveDataConnector(int, boolean, int, boolean, int) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.ActiveDataConnector
creates a new active connector and fully configure it.

AddPlugin - Annotation Type in fr.sorbonne_u.components.annotations
The annotation AddPlugin put on a component definition class tells BCM that a plug-in instantiated from the given class must be added to the component with the given URI.
AddPlugins - Annotation Type in fr.sorbonne_u.components.annotations
The annotation AddPlugins collects a list of AddPlugin annotations.
